amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to offsetting the costs of operations against the Islamic State.

vote.text: Amendment SA 966 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 110.

action.text: Amendment SA 966 proposed by Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S1994; text as modified: CR S1994) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to offsetting the costs of operations against the Islamic State.
